sqlMap.update:

sqlMap.sql: select u.COST_ADJUST_DTL_ID, u.COST_ADJUST_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.STD_UNIT, u.SPCL_TECH_ID, u.ADJUST_AMOUNT, u.REMARK, a.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, a.DM_SPCL_TECH_NO, u.NEW_COST_PRICE, u.CUR_COST_PRICE, (u.PRD_ID || u.SPCL_TECH_ID)CHECKONLY from DRP_COST_ADJUST_DTL u left join DRP_SPCL_TECH a on a.SPCL_TECH_ID = u.SPCL_TECH_ID and a.USE_FLAG = 1
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_COST_ADJUST_DTL( COST_ADJUST_DTL_ID, COST_ADJUST_ID, PRD_ID, PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC, STD_UNIT, SPCL_TECH_ID, ADJUST_AMOUNT, REMARK, DEL_FLAG, NEW_COST_PRICE, CUR_COST_PRICE )values( #COST_ADJUST_DTL_ID#, #COST_ADJUST_ID#, #PRD_ID#, #PRD_NO#, #PRD_NAME#, #PRD_SPEC#, #STD_UNIT#, #SPCL_TECH_ID#, #ADJUST_AMOUNT#, #REMARK#, #DEL_FLAG#, #NEW_COST_PRICE#, #CUR_COST_PRICE# )

update DRP_COST_ADJUST_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where COST_ADJUST_ID = #COST_ADJUST_ID:VARCHAR#

sqlMap.select: select count(1) cnt from DRP_COST_ADJUST a left join DRP_COST_ADJUST_DTL b on a.COST_ADJUST_ID = b.COST_ADJUST_ID and b.DEL_FLAG = 0 where a.DEL_FLAG = 0 and (a.YEAR, a.MONTH, b.PRD_ID, NVL(b.SPCL_TECH_ID, 'NULL')) in (select a.YEAR, a.MONTH, b.PRD_ID, NVL(b.SPCL_TECH_ID, 'NULL') from DRP_COST_ADJUST a left join DRP_COST_ADJUST_DTL b on a.COST_ADJUST_ID = b.COST_ADJUST_ID and b.DEL_FLAG = 0 where a.DEL_FLAG = 0 and a.COST_ADJUST_ID = #COST_ADJUST_ID#) and a.COST_ADJUST_ID != #COST_ADJUST_ID# and a.STATE != '审核通过'
select count(PRD_NO)cnt from DRP_COST_ADJUST_DTL where COST_ADJUST_ID = #COST_ADJUST_ID# and DEL_FLAG = 0 group by PRD_ID, SPCL_TECH_ID having count(PRD_ID)>1
